guts.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the courage and determination you need to do something difficult or unpleasant
guts.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: It takes guts to start a new business on your own.
No one had the guts to tell Paul what a mistake he was making.
guts.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the parts inside a machine or piece of equipment
guts.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: the most important or basic parts of something
